LanguageData.Apparello_Clawboots.label: Clawed Boots
LanguageData.Apparello_Clawboots.description: Boots with claws on them. They give a steady grip on rough terrain.
LanguageData.Apparello_Shoes.label: Shoes
LanguageData.Apparello_Shoes.description: Very basic shoes. Helps with moving through terrain.
LanguageData.MedievalTimes_Boots_Steel_Plated.label: Plated Boots
LanguageData.MedievalTimes_Boots_Steel_Plated.descrip: A pair of leather boots with steel plates strapped on.
LanguageData.Apparello_MetalBoots.label: Metal Boots
LanguageData.Apparello_MetalBoots.description: Metal boots. Ain't nobody stepping on your toes now!
LanguageData.Apparello_Snowboots.label: Snow Boots
LanguageData.Apparello_Snowboots.description: Boots designed for cold snow. They are exceptionally warm and comfy.
LanguageData.Apparello_NorbalMuffshoes.label: Fur Boots
LanguageData.Apparello_NorbalMuffshoes.description: Very furry and warm boots. They can help with moving through terrain.
LanguageData.Apparello_Boots.label: Spurred Boots
LanguageData.Apparello_Boots.description: Leather boots with spurs. The spurs help with moving through terrain.
LanguageData.MedievalTimes_Boots_Combat.label: Combat Boots
LanguageData.MedievalTimes_Boots_Combat.description: Adjustments in the design straps, Hyper-Gel insoles and contouring Hyper-Foam ensure a comfortable fit for any foot type.
LanguageData.MedievalTimes_Boots_Techno.label: Techno Boots
LanguageData.MedievalTimes_Boots_Techno.description: Custom made by Rocket Industries, these marvels of modern engineering come complete with metal plating, nanite recursive fibers, gravity assist hydraulics, Omega-weave electric stranding and thermo-dynamic assist functions. Even with all that they found room for the Hyper-Gel insoles and contouring Hyper-Foam, not that its needed with nanite recursive fibers.
LanguageData.Apparello_Spboots.label: Cryptonaut Springers
LanguageData.Apparello_Spboots.description: A pair of footwear designed for ultimate balance. Stride through the environment like a rabbit on dope.
